thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 26 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Bank of Ireland CFO says dividend target will take number of years

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Bank of Ireland CFO says dividend target will take number of years

organizations.name: reuters) - bank of ireland group plc

text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - Bank Of Ireland Group Plc:
* BANK OF IRELAND CFO SAYS WILL TAKE A NUMBER OF YEARS TO BUILD DIVIDEND TOWARDS TARGET OF 50 PERCENT OF SUSTAINABLE EARNINGS
* BANK OF IRELAND CEO SAYS GROWTH IN NET LOAN BOOK MAY BE MODEST IN THE FIRST YEAR
* BANK OF IRELAND CEO SAYS THINKS WILL BE ABLE TO WEATHER A RANGE OF BREXIT SCENARIOS WITH STRONG CAPITAL, PROFIT OUTLOOK Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reporting By Padraic Halpin)
